verses.verse: Like <S%H7950>snow<s%> in <S%H7019>summer,<s%> and as <S%H4306>rain<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> so <S%H3519>honor<s%> is not <S%H5000>fitting<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
Like a <S%H5110>fluttering<s%> <S%H6833>sparrow,<s%> like a <S%H5774>darting<s%> <S%H1866>swallow,<s%> so the undeserved <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H935>doesn't<s%> come to <S%H935>rest.<s%>
A <S%H7752>whip<s%> is for the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> a <S%H4964>bridle<s%> for the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and a <S%H7626>rod<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools!<s%>
<S%H6030>Don't<s%> answer a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly,<s%> lest you also be like <S%H7737>him.<s%>
<S%H6030>Answer<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly,<s%> lest he be <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
One who <S%H7971>sends<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> is cutting <S%H7096>off<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
Like the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of the <S%H6455>lame<s%> that hang <S%H1809>loose:<s%> so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
As one who <S%H6872>binds<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in a <S%H4773>sling,<s%> so is he who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
Like a <S%H2336>thornbush<s%> that <S%H5927>goes<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7910>drunkard,<s%> so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
As an <S%H7227>archer<s%> who <S%H2342>wounds<s%> <S%H7936>all,<s%> so is he who hires a <S%H3684>fool<s%> or he who <S%H7936>hires<s%> those who pass <S%H5674>by.<s%>
As a <S%H3611>dog<s%> that <S%H7725>returns<s%> to his <S%H6892>vomit,<s%> so is a <S%H3684>fool<s%> who <S%H8138>repeats<s%> his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
Do you <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes?<s%> There is more <S%H8615>hope<s%> for a fool than for <S%H3684>him.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "There is a <S%H7826>lion<s%> in the <S%H1870>road!<s%> A fierce <S%H7826>lion<s%> roams the <S%H7339>streets!<s%>"
As the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H5437>turns<s%> on its <S%H6735>hinges,<s%> so does the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>buries<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish.<s%> He is too <S%H3811>lazy<s%> to bring it <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is <S%H2450>wiser<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than seven <S%H7651>men<s%> who <S%H7725>answer<s%> with <S%H2940>discretion.<s%>
Like one who <S%H2388>grabs<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%>'s <S%H241>ears<s%> is one who passes <S%H5674>by<s%> and <S%H5674>meddles<s%> in a quarrel not his <S%H7379>own.<s%>
Like a <S%H3856>madman<s%> who <S%H3384>shoots<s%> <S%H2131>torches,<s%> <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%>
is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7411>deceives<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and <S%H559>says,<s%> "Am I not <S%H7832>joking?<s%>"
For <S%H657>lack<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> goes <S%H3518>out.<s%> Without <S%H5372>gossip,<s%> a <S%H4066>quarrel<s%> dies <S%H8367>down.<s%>
As <S%H6352>coals<s%> are to hot <S%H1513>embers,<s%> and <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H784>fire,<s%> so is a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H2787>kindling<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> are as dainty <S%H3859>morsels,<s%> they go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H990>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts.<s%>
Like <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H5509>dross<s%> <S%H6823>on<s%> an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> vessel are the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H1814>fervent<s%> one with an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
A <S%H8130>malicious<s%> man <S%H5234>disguises<s%> himself with his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> but he <S%H7896>harbors<s%> <S%H4820>evil<s%> in his <S%H7130>heart.<s%>
When his <S%H6963>speech<s%> is <S%H2603>charming,<s%> <S%H539>don't<s%> believe <S%H7651>him;<s%> for there are seven <S%H8441>abominations<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
His <S%H8135>malice<s%> may be <S%H3680>concealed<s%> by <S%H4860>deception,<s%> but his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> will be <S%H1540>exposed<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>
Whoever <S%H3738>digs<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into <S%H1556>it.<s%> Whoever rolls a <S%H68>stone,<s%> it will come back on <S%H7725>him.<s%>
A <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> those it <S%H1790>hurts;<s%> and a <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H4072>ruin.<s%>
